message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product.  It's something that I believe would be a valuable asset for you, and I'm confident it aligns with your needs. I'm prepared to sell it for $1,750,000. Let me know your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and I understand your perspective. While $1,200,000 is a good offer, it's below my minimum for this product. I'm willing to compromise, but I can't go lower than $1,550,000. This would still be a great deal for you, considering the value it offers. What are your thoughts?

I understand that you're willing to compromise, but I still think $1,550,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $1,275,000. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
